U

updateMinStock(String, String, String) - Method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Restaurant
This method is used to allow the minimum stock level to be changed Users need to choose the item which is required to change and input the quantity they would like to update it to If successful, the system will state "Minimum stock levels updated to: " + min If unsuccessful, the system will state "SQL exception occurred when closing SQL statement"
updateMinStock(String, String, String) - Method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Warehouse
Method which allows the Warehouse stock minimum levels to be set If successful, the system will show "MIN_STOCK_VALUE_UPDATED" If unsuccessful request, the system will show "REQUEST_MISSPECIFIED"
updateStock(String, String, String) - Method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Restaurant
Method to update the restaurant stock allowing for manual adjustment of stock levels If successsful, system shows "STOCK_UPDATED" If unsuccessful, system shows "ERROR_UPDATING_STOCK"
updateStock(String, String, String) - Method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Warehouse
Method to increase the warehouse stock by the quantity specified Takes parameters of stock item and quantity {stockItem: string, quantity: number} If successful, system shows "STOCK_UPDATED" If JSON request unsuccessful, system shows "Order entry misspecified.
